overview:
David Johnson is a seasoned executive with 25 years of experience in finance and technology. As CEO of First Associates Loan Servicing, he has spearheaded the development of new and innovative approaches in the industry that have dramatically improved the value of serviced portfolios while increasing borrower satisfaction rates. As a result, the company has become the nation’s fastest growing loan servicer with a multi-billion dollar portfolio under management.

Prior to First Associates, Mr. Johnson was a Principal at Clearpath advisors, a San Diego-based private equity firm. Before that, he was the Senior Vice President of Corporate Development for Memec LLC, a $2B+ semiconductor company spanning more than 140 countries. Mr. Johnson worked at McKinsey & Company and Bain & Company, where his clients were Global 500 companies in Asia, Europe, Africa and North America.

Mr. Johnson received his MBA from Stanford University School of Business and a Bachelor’s of Science in Finance from the University of California at Berkeley. He is the Chairman of JLMC, an NGO focused on sustainable development in Africa and a member of YPO.
